img.alt: More Art work with Kelly Bledsoe at MES

div.p: The vision of Marion County Schools is to prepare students to meet the challenges and demands of their futures.

span.strong: Director of Schools - Dr. Mark A. Griffith

strong.span: Due to the continued threat of Covid-19, Marion County Schools will be closed until August 2020.

span.strong: Pre-K registration will be Wednesday, May 6th and Friday, May 8th for the 2020-2021 school year. Registration packets will be available at all elementary schools and all feeding stations (see below) for parents/guardians to drive through and pick up from 9:00 am - 10:30 am. An envelope will be included for completed registration and required documentation for return on Friday, May 15th. Registration materials can also be downloaded from the Marion School's website beginning May 4th. There will be an online workshop for parents/guardians beginning the first week of June. Acceptance/waiting letters will be sent by the second week of July.

span.span: Click HERE for detailed information on Grab and Go Meals being served during the COVID-19 school closures.
Click HERE for detailed information on instructional resources being provided by Marion County Schools during COVID-19 school closures.

p.span: Please see the pacing guides below for students to follow while completing school work.
-JES- Tammy Rollins - Jasper Elementary Physical Education - FB
-JES - Alli Brooks - Virtual lessons live at 12:00- FB
-Wesley Brewer- Mr. Brewer's Music Room- FB
and wes.art.room on Instagram – new postings on Tuesdays and Thursdays
-Isaac Blevins- Whitwell Elementary School Library- FB- storytelling everyday

div.span: -South Pittsburg Elementary School-FB- each RA teachers is posting a lesson 1 day a week. Monday- Library, Tuesday- Music, Wednesday- Guidance, Thursday- PE, Friday- Art

span.span: SVEConnect offers free Wi-Fi hotspots throughout Marion County!

p.strong: The problem is not that there are problems. The problem is expecting otherwise and thinking that having problems is a problem.
